parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Locations

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Find the nearest location having a non-empty speech.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>No locations are dubbed in <template><title>arma3</title></template>.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]] position

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> position: [[Object]] or [[Array]] in format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_location = [[nearestLocationWithDubbing]] [[getMarkerPos]] "myMarker";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[findNearestEnemy]], [[nearestBuilding]], [[nearestObject]], [[nearestObjects]], [[nearObjects]], [[nearestLocation]], [[nearEntities]], [[nearTargets]], [[nearSupplies]], [[nearObjectsReady]], [[nearRoads]]
</value></part></template>
